long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the Easy Grader, a quintessential Chrome extension for educators worldwide! Are you tired of crunching numbers every grading season? Easy Grader simplifies the tedious task of converting raw scores into grades.

Whether you're a seasoned educator or a fresh teaching assistant, this tool offers a streamlined process to compute student scores, ensuring accuracy every time efficiently.

Features:
– Simple Interface: Input the total number of questions and the number of questions a student got wrong. Let the Easy Grader do the rest!
– Instant Calculation: Get real-time results showing the corresponding percentage and grade.
– Comprehensive Breakdown: Don’t just see the final grade! The Easy Grader provides a detailed grade breakdown, allowing educators to understand the scoring spectrum from 100% to 0%.

How It Works:
– Input the total number of questions in the "# of questions" field.
– Input the number of questions a student answered incorrectly in the "# of wrong questions" field.
– Instantly view the result, showing both the percentage and the grade.
– For a detailed perspective, check out the comprehensive table below that shows the breakdown of correct vs. wrong answers, the resulting percentage, and the scaled grade.

Educators, make your grading life a breeze with the Easy Grader Chrome extension. Say goodbye to complex grading sheets and embrace the future of grading!
